mapper.select: select id, name, member_type from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select dev_cat_num, dev_cat_name from development_category where rc_num=#{value}
select dc.dev_cat_name from development_category dc, job_dev jd where dc.dev_cat_num=jd.dev_cat_num and jd.job_posting_num=#{jobPostingNum}
select lc.loc_name from location_category lc , job_loc jl where lc.loc_num=jl.loc_num and jl.job_posting_num=#{jobPostingNum}
select rc.rc_name from recruitment_category rc , job_recruitment jr where rc.rc_num=jr.rc_num and jr.job_posting_num=#{jobPostingNum}
select ac.academic_name from academic_category ac , job_academic ja where ac.academic_num=ja.academic_num and ja.job_posting_num=#{jobPostingNum}
select etc.emp_type_name from employment_type_category etc , job_emp je where etc.emp_type_num=je.emp_type_num and je.job_posting_num=#{jobPostingNum}
